articles.author: NICHOLAS RICCARDI, NICHOLAS RICCARDI
articles.title: Some top tech leaders have embraced Trump. That's created a political divide in Silicon Valley - Star Tribune
articles.description: Like many in the tech industry, Jeremy Lyons used to think of himself as a relatively apolitical guy.
articles.content:
SAN JOSE, Calif. Like many in the tech industry, Jeremy Lyons used to think of himself as a relatively apolitical guy.
The only time he had participated in a demonstration before now was in the open… [+1566 chars]
